name: It Gives
description:
A narrative 2D platformer game that takes place in a futuristic world where people and robots coexist. Play as Tulip, a young girl, as you venture through the world trying to find your parents. Make friends with people and robots, but be careful - those who give may take, too.

Controls:

  • Move: a/d
  • Jump: w
  • Interact: e
  • Attack: Space
  • Pause: Escape

Created during the Virginia Tech Game Project Spring 2020 Game Jam (theme: It takes two).

Credits:

  • Marty Hanapole (Lead programming)
  • Matthew Jaffe (Programming)
  • Owen Kern (Programming, UI)
  • Griffin Knock (Music, story)
  • Claire Holmes (Art)
  • Caleb Huck (Art)
  • Sophia Dilandro (Art)
